meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with wampuses, each one looking unique.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper fed the wampuses their favorite fruits.
meanings.sent3: The wampuses decided to have a picnic in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The wampuses in the story symbolized different aspects of nature.
meanings.sent5: The children's book was full of colorful illustrations of wampuses.

meanings.definition: Wampuses: third person singular present of wampus
meanings.sent1: She wampuses through the park every morning for exercise.
meanings.sent2: The cat wampuses around the house, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent3: The robot wampuses clumsily, bumping into walls.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts wampuses from one idea to another, never settling.
meanings.sent5: The dancer wampuses gracefully across the stage, captivating the audience.
